attributes.action: Ensure that the United Kingdom can vote in the European Election in May 2019
attributes.additional_details: To answer the question "What kind of message would that send to the more than 17 million people who voted to leave the EU nearly three years ago now?" It would tell us that we live in a democracy not a dictatorship, and anyone who doesn't wish to participate in those elections doesn't have to, as that is also their democratic right. Thanks
attributes.background: It is currently our democratic right to participate in these elections as European citizens, and we're disappointed that more people do not realise the increased risk of "cliff edge" no deal Brexit which applies if we DON'T participate.
